loans.name: Marcel

texts.es:
Ms Marcel is a 44-year-old mother of four, one of which is in school. She started her video game rental with one monitor and without any hope of growth. Nevertheless, the results were different. This small idea has been a rewarding one. Additionally, she has installed an arcade and contributed to the purchase of a moto-taxi for her husband's daily deliveries. She hopes to obtain a loan to repair her establishment to meet her clients' comfort.

Translated from Spanish by Marco Alves, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Marcel de 44 años de edad, es madre de 04 hijos que aún se encuentran en edad escolar, inició el alquiler de video juegos con un monitor y sin la esperanza de progresar, sin embargo los resultados fueron otros y esta pequeña idea le ha otorgado durante todo este tiempo innumerables satisfacciones. Adicionalmente ha decidido instalar una juguería y ha contribuido con la compra de un mototaxi para el desempeño diario de su querido esposo.Desea obtener un préstamo para acondicionar su establecimiento para comodidad de sus clientes.

loans.use: To remodel her video game rental space

loans.name: Esther

texts.es:
Esther began to sell food when she constructed a restaurant in her own home. Her customers have shown her great affection because she has provided them with great service. She is 51 years old and a mother of seven. She hopes to increase the quantity and variety of her dishes so that she may offer them in a daily buffet. With a large number of national and international dishes she hopes to make her restaurant popular.

Translated from Spanish by Marco Alves, Kiva Volunteer.

Su dedicación a la venta de comida hizo que la señora Esther construyera en su propio domicilio un restaurante, por la misma razón que sus clientes le extendían esta solicitud a diario, ella por su buena atención y sazón, se ha ganado el cariño y respeto de sus clientes. Tiene 51 años de edad, es madre de 7 hijos y desea incrementar la cantidad y variedad de sus comidas para ofrecerlos a través de un buffet a diario y con una amplia variedad de platillos nacionales e internacionales con el objetivo de popularizar su restaurante.

loans.use: To invest capital in order to further her proposal to establish a restaurant with great variety

loans.name: Lucy

texts.es:
Lucy is a 36-year-old mother of three. She provides services in her beauty center. She is very grateful to the practice and experience she has gained. It has allowed her to create her own work space in her home. There is a great demand for her services, and thus she has decided to relocate to establish a comprehensive center that will meet her clients' needs.

Translated from Spanish by Marco Alves, Kiva Volunteer.

Lucy de 36 años es madre de tres hijos, se dedica a brindar servicios en su centro de belleza e imagen personal, gracias a la práctica y experiencia que ganó puso en su propio domicilio su centro de trabajo.Posee una gran demanda y ha decidido mudarse para poner un centro de belleza integral, con todos y cada uno de los servicios que hoy en día solicitan sus clientes.

loans.use: To rent a larger space to establish her new work center

loans.name: Meyling Lissette

texts.es:
Meyling Lissette Martínez is a strong person who dedicates herself to the selling of hardware from her own business located in her home in the Villanueva area of Chinandega.

One of Meyling’s urgent needs is obtain the resources to buy inventory for her hardware store and therefore she is seeking support from Ceprodel for a loan that would enable her to buy these product and thereby improve her family’s standard of living. She had loans a year ago with Ceprodel that have been repaid in a satisfactory manner according to the terms of her loans.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

La dama Meyling Lissette Martínez es una persona muy esforzada que se dedica al negocio de la venta de productos de ferretería teniendo su propio establecimiento en su casa de habitación en el municipio de Villanueva de Chinandega.

Una de las necesidades que la señora Meyling atraviesa es la urgencia de adquirir recursos económicos para la compra de productos ferreteros es por este motivo que ella busca apoyo en Ceprodel para ser beneficiada con créditos que le permitan la compra de estos productos y así mejorar la condición de vida de su familia. Actualmente ella tiene créditos desde hace un año con Ceprodel habiéndolos cancelado satisfactoriamente según lo establecido.

loans.use: Purchase inventory for hardware store

loans.name: Olinda Odili

texts.es:
Mrs. Olinda Duarte’s business is making milk products such as curd and cheese which she sells from her home in the Villanueva area of Chinandega city. She is the mother of two school-aged children and together with her husband they work to supply their basic necessities and give them a better standard of living.

Today Olinda finds herself in need of capital to buy the ingredients needed to make curds and cheese. Therefore she approached Ceprodel for a loan enabling her to provide a better life for her children and make her dream come true that her children will become educated professionals.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

El negocio al que se dedica la señora Olinda Duarte es a la elaboración de productos derivados de los lácteos tales como cuajada y queso el cual los comercializa en su casa de habitación en el municipio de Villanueva de la ciudad de Chinandega. Actualmente es madre de dos hijos en edad escolar el cual junto con su esposo se esfuerzan para suplir sus necesidades y brindarles un mejor estilo de vida.

La necesidad que hoy en día atraviesa la señora Olinda es la adquisición del recurso económico para la compra de la materia prima para elaborar la cuajada y queso. Es por este motivo que acude a Ceprodel para obtener el crédito y así continuar brindando a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida y así cumplir su sueño de que lleguen a ser grandes profesionales.

loans.use: Purchase ingredients to make cheese and curds

loans.name: Petrona

texts.es:
Selling tortillas is the business that Mrs. Petrona M. dedicates herself to with great effort in the Villanueva area of Chinandega city. She is a married mother responsible for one son who she greatly worries about providing schooling that he needs in spite of the family’s economic situation.

Today Petrona urgently needs corn to make tortillas but does not have the economic resources because she has little savings. She has approached CEPRODEL to obtain a loan that will enable her to acquire corn and thereby make her tortillas that surely are delicious as she is one of the best tortilla makers in her area.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

La venta de tortillas es el negocio al que con mucho esfuerzo se dedica la señora Petrona M. en el municipio de Villanueva de la ciudad de Chinandega. Es madre casada y con un hijo a su responsabilidad que se preocupa grandemente por brindarle las posibilidades de estudio que este necesita a pesar de su situación económica.

La necesidad actual de la señora Petrona es la urgencia de adquirir el maíz para la elaboración de las tortillas pero al no contar con el recurso económico por ser de escasos ingresos ha acudido a CEPRODEL para obtener créditos que le permitan adquirir el maíz y así elaborar las tortillas que por cierto las prepara muy deliciosas siendo ella una de las mejores elaboradoras de tortilla en su localidad.

loans.use: Buy ingredients to make tortillas

loans.name: Rosa Rosenda

texts.es:
The business Rosa, known as Rosita, has is selling candy and snacks in the Villanueva area as a street vendor. She sells every day beginning in the early morning hours.

She has three children who study every day in a neighborhood school in her area. It is for this reason that she works every day to provide better quality of life for her children and secure their future. In order to support her work Ceprodel has been fundamental in providing her loans that have enabled her to buy products to improve her business and therefore it is growing little by little.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

La actividad económica de la Señora Rosa conocida comúnmente como Rosita es la venta de golosinas y comestibles livianos en el municipio de Villanueva vendiendo ambulante por las calles todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana.

Es madre de tres hijos de los cuales todos ellos estudian en un pequeño colegio de su localidad. Es por esto que ella se esfuerza a diario para brindarles las mejores condiciones de vida y así sacarlos adelante. Para apoyarse en sus labores Ceprodel ha sido muy fundamental pilar debido a que le ha proporcionado créditos que le han permitido comprar sus productos para mejorar su negocio y así ir creciendo poco a poco en su sector económico.

loans.use: Purchase candy and snacks to sell

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.es:
Rosalina Gonzáles is a woman worthy of being a role model as every day she sells, as a street vendor, in the streets of Villanueva, her candy and snack products to her customers.

She is a person characterized as being very hard working and in addition in spite of her difficult economic situation in which she has found herself for quite some time, she continues trying to better her standard of living and that of her children. Ceprodel has been a pillar in the improvement of her business by providing loans that have enable her to invest in purchasing candy to sell. She has a history of four loans with Ceprodel.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

Rosalina Gonzáles es una dama digna de imitar debido a que todos los días vende ambulantemente en las calles de Villanueva sus productos de golosinas y comestibles ofreciéndolos a sus clientes.

Es una persona que se caracteriza por ser muy trabajadora y además a pesar de su difícil situación económica que por mucho tiempo la ha rodeado, continua esforzándose para mejorar su condición de vida y la de sus hijos. Ceprodel ha sido un pilar en el mejoramiento de su negocio por medio de los créditos que le ha otorgado habiéndolos invertido en la compra de las golosinas para comercializarlas. Actualmente su record crediticio es de cuatro créditos con Ceprodel.

loans.use: Purchase products to sell

loans.name: Sandra Victoria

texts.es:
Mrs. Sandra makes a living selling various products out of her home located in the municipality of Villanueva, where she has been a resident for several years.

She is a mother of two children to whom she has the responsibility of maintaining, educating and providing a good roof over their heads. She currently in need of financial help with the acquisition of products for her store. This is the reason for her request to Ceprodel for a timely loan which will enable her to obtain the products that she will later sell in her store.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Bobbit, Kiva volunteer.

La actividad económica a la que se dedica la señora Sandra es a la venta de productos varios en su casa de habitación ubicada en el municipio de Villanueva del cual ella es originaria desde hace varios años.

Es madre de dos hijos que tiene la responsabilidad de mantener dándole estudios, alimentación y un techo digno donde vivir. La necesidad que actualmente atraviesa es la adquisición de recursos económicos para adquirir los productos de la pulpería. Por este motivo acude a Ceprodel para obtener el crédito oportuno y así adquirir los productos para luego comercializarlos en su pulpería.

loans.use: Purchase of merchandise.

loans.name: Urcino

texts.es:
Urcino A. is a gentleman native of the city of Chinandega who has his own general store which he has stocked to be able to improve his income and thus benefit his three school age children.

Since all start ups are difficult, Mr. Urcino started his business selling a few products and little by little he has been able to diversify improving his general store. Ceprodel has been an important pillar in his business since the support of the loans has allowed him to acquire more products for their eventual sale. He is now seeking the help of Ceprodel again, knowing that he will get the loan to obtain merchandise for his store.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Bobbit, Kiva volunteer.

Urcino Alemán es un caballero originario de la ciudad de Chinandega que posee su propio negocio de pulpería el cual se ha preocupado por surtir para obtener un mejor ingreso y así beneficiar a sus tres hijos en edad escolar.

Como todo inicio es difícil, el señor Urcino inició su negocio vendiendo pocos productos pero poco a poco se ha venido diversificado hasta mejorar en parte su pulpería. Ceprodel ha sido un pilar importante en su negocio por lo que le ha apoyado con créditos que le han permitido adquirir sus productos para su respectiva comercialización. Hoy en día una vez mas acude a Ceprodel consiente de que obtendrá el crédito para adquirir sus productos de pulpería.

loans.use: Purchase of merchandise for the general store.

loans.name: Yasmina Mercedes

texts.es:
Mrs. Yasmina B. is a very hard working lady who works out of her house in the municipality of Villanueva selling cosmetic products. She has her own place of business where she uses a glass case to place and display her products.

It is important to note that this is the only source of income that she has to maintain her home and for this reason she is seeking the help of Ceprodel to improve her financial condition and get ahead in her cosmetic sales business.

Currently she has a history of two loans with Ceprodel which she has repaid in time and according to the agreement set out by both parties.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Bobbit, Kiva volunteer.

La señora Yasmina B. es una dama muy esforzada que labora en su casa de habitación en el municipio de Villanueva vendiendo productos cosméticos teniendo su propio establecimiento que cuenta con una vitrina de vidrio donde coloca sus productos.

Es necesario destacar que este es el único ingreso económico que percibe para mantener su hogar y por este motivo hoy en día busca apoyo en Ceprodel para ser beneficiado con créditos que le permitan mejorar su situación económica y así salir adelante en el negocio de venta de cosméticos.

Actualmente su record crediticio es de dos créditos con CEPRODEL habiéndolos cancelado en tiempo y forma según lo establecido por ambas partes.

loans.use: Purchase of cosmetics.

loans.name: Satupaitea Mosula Centre - Group 1

texts.en:
After four weeks of rigorous business training, these six women of Satupaitea Mosula on the island of Savaii, passed their written tests on the SPBD principles (business, savings, weekly meetings, payments and group guarantee) to ensure their first group loan from SPBD. Over the next year, they will support each other in their individual business development to guarantee on-time payments.

Merenaite F., 30, married, with five children, has over two years of experience growing vegetables. Specifically, she sells cabbages, cucumbers and tomatoes. Her husband is a seasoned farmer. With her loan, she will purchase cucumbers, cabbages, fertilizer, weed killing sprayer and pesticides.

Esi A., 41, married, with five children, has over three years of experience in maintaining a taro plantation. Taro is a staple of the Samoan diet. Her loan will be used to purchase a weed killing sprayer, pesticides, 2 bush knives, a filing and a spade. She hopes to earn a net cash flow of 310 Tala (~120 USD) per week.

Silika L., 29 and married, has worked in tandem with her husband growing cabbage and taro for over two years. A loan will permit her to purchase cabbage seeds, barbed wire, a filing, and a knife, a weed killing sprayer, a rake and fertilizer.

Fetu T., 38, married, with two children, has worked in tandem with her husband, catching and selling fish for over two years. With her loan, she will purchase a fishing boat, a lantern, a spear and fishing boots. Together, they expect to earn a net cash flow of 220 Tala (~88 USD) per week.

Fue M., 34, married, with four children, bakes banana chips sold to the other villagers, public and school children. She will use her loan to purchase pots, oil, bowls and other materials to bake the chips.

Solema I., 28, married, with one child, works with her husband catching selling fish. With her loan, she will purchase a fishing boat, goggles, a cooler and fishing boots.

loans.use: To purchase farming and fishing equipment

loans.name: Lila

texts.es:
Lila is a happy and hard working woman. Her immense love she has as a mother and wife motivate her to keep striving with greater perseverance than ever in her small producitve clothing factory. Her business has become the only family income, that has become a success with the helpf of her hard working husband Wilber. They are both originally from the district of Vilquechico, one that they left 5 years ago in hopes of finding better opportunities. Today they live in the city of Juliaca and slow and with hard work and many sacrifices they have managed to purchase sewing machines and have provided work for two other people that feel very happy in their work and the good working conditions they work in. Once they have made enough articles of clothing Lila and Wilber sell their products wholesale in department stores in Tacna, Puno, Cuzco and Ayacucho. The challenge facing this hard working couple is to find more workers and purchase more materials to increase their merchandise - for this they are appealing to your good heart with the hopes of receiving your help.

Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer.

Lila, es una mujer muy alegre y empeñosa, su inmenso amor de madre y esposa la motivan a seguir esforzándose con mayor perseverancia en su pequeña, pero rentable fábrica de confección de prendas de vestir. Este negocio se ha convertido en el único ingreso de su familia ya que con mucho empeño y diligencia viene sacando adelante junto a su emprendedor esposo Wilber.Ambos son del distrito de Vilquechico y hace más de 5 años decidieron salir de su pueblo natal en busca de mejores oportunidades. Actualmente radican en la ciudad de Juliaca y poco a poco con mucho empeño y privaciones han logrado comprar máquinas de coser, en dicho tallercito también ofrecen trabajo a otras 2 personas quienes se sienten muy satisfechos por la actividad que realizan y el buen trato que reciben.Luego de confeccionar una buena cantidad de prendas de vestir doña Lila y Wilber se encargan de venderlos al por mayor en los departamentos de Tacna, Puno, Cuzco y Ayacucho; el proyecto de esta laboriosa pareja de esposos es contratar más personal y adquirir mayor cantidad de materia prima para incrementar la cantidad de su mercadería, es por ello que recurren a tu buen corazón con la esperanza de recibir tu ayuda.

loans.use: To increase her capital in order to hire more young workers and increase volume of production.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
About 2 years ago Elizabeth decided to remodel her home to include a small internet cafe to provide services to her community. Her business has been very successful because it is one of the few internet cafe's that exist in her community. But with the passing months things started to change and some competing business started to appear. She now sees that her household income has decrease due to this competition and she has seen the need to start another business. She decided to buy a hot dog cart and sell fast food (hot dogs and hamburgers). Elizabeth believes that with this new business she will be agle to obtain the important income she neesd for her beloved family, including her hard working husband Edgar and her little girl Teresa, aged 3 years. You can be a great contributor to Elizabeth and her family.

Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer.

Hace aproximadamente 2 años Elizabeth decidió acondicionar su vivienda para instalar y brindar servicios de internet a su comunidad, este negocio le fue resultando muy rentable porque es una de las pocas cabinas que existía en su zona en ese tiempo; pero con el transcurso de los meses las cosas fueron cambiando y la competencia fue extendiéndose.Ahora al ver que los ingresos de su hogar han disminuido debido a la competencia, se ha visto en la necesidad de abrir otro negocio, es así que decidió comprar un carrito salchipapero y vender en las afueras de su negocio comida rápida (salchipapas, hamburguesas), Elizabeth cree que con este negocio logrará obtener ingresos económicos importantes para su querida familia que la integran su laborioso esposo Edgar y su pequeña niña Teresa de 3 añitos de edad. Usted puede ser un gran colaborador de Elizabeth y su familia.

loans.use: Increase in capital to remodel the new business.

loans.name: Rita

texts.es:
Rita is the eldest of 3 children. Her happy disposition and her hard working nature have become her greatest attributes. Rita, immediately after having completed high school she decided to face life head on so that she might earn a daily living to support her parents and to provide an education to her younger brothers. This hard working young woman tried her luck in many jobs but unfortunately none were very profitable. But a few months ago she decided to buy an immense variety of fruits and vegetables wholesale in her native city of Juliaca to re-sell in a mine, a secluded, cold and poorly accessible location. With this business and her hard work, finally she has been able to improve the quality of life for herself and for her beloved parents. With your generous support it will be possible for Rita to firmly establish her efforts.

Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer.

Rita es la mayor de 3 hermanos, su alegría y empeño por progresar se han convertido en sus principales características. Rita inmediatamente después de concluir sus estudios secundarios decidió enfrentarse a la vida para ganarse el sustento diario y así apoyar a sus padres con la educación de sus menores hermanos.Ésta emprendedora muchacha tentó suerte con muchas actividades, desafortunadamente ninguna le resultaba rentable, hasta hace algunos meses que decidió comprar una inmensa variedad de verduras y choclos al por mayor de su ciudad natal Juliaca para venderlos en la mina rinconada, lugar muy distante, frígido y poco accesible.Con este negocio y su empeño, finalmente está logrando mejorar su calidad de vida y apoyar a sus queridos padres.Tu generoso aporte permitirá concretar los proyectos de Rita.

loans.use: An increase in her capital so that she might offer vegetables in greater quantities.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
The family run bakery that she inherited from her parents has given her the opportunity to improve her income and her standard of living. Hilda is a mother of 2 small children that are the love of her live and provide her the drive behind her constant efforts. Like every other mother she looks out for the well-being and peace in her family, and so she decided to work very hard to make the bakery a success, hoping to become the biggest bakery in her neighbourhood. Her goal is to save enoguh money to remodel her modest home and her bakery as well. With this in mind, she is requesting a loan to purchase more ingredients and raw materials to increase and improve her products.

Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer.

La panadería familiar que heredó de sus padres le ha dado la oportunidad de mejorar sus ingresos económicos y condición de vida. Hilda, es madre de 2 pequeños niños quienes son su mayor adoración y motivo de su esfuerzo constante.Como toda madre preocupada por el bienestar y tranquilidad de su familia decidió poner mucho empeño para sacar adelante su negocio de producción de panes, y a si lograr ser la proveedora principal de su localidad de este importante e indispensable alimento.Su deseo es ahorrar lo suficiente para refaccionar su modesta morada y panadería también, teniendo en mente este propósito solicita un préstamo para incrementar la cantidad de materia prima y por ende sus productos a fin de ampliar y mejorar su mercado.

loans.use: Increase in capital to increase production.

loans.name: Giovanna

texts.es:
Giovanna, in her 21 years has demonstrated that she is a hard working, creative and intelligent woman. Sher immense will to make herself into an excellent professional has motivated her to keep up her efforts in the noble business in paper recycling. She decided to take on this business thanks to an initiative started by her beloved parents, who supported her every step along the way and motivated her in her work. During her spare time she travels along practicallly every major route in her native city of Juliaca, with the goal of acquiring her merchandise from business, factories, and institutions in her city. Once she has gathered enough she sells it to a paper factory, a producer of note books and bathroom tissues, located in the city of Arequipa. With this wonderful job she has managed to covery the costs of her university education. Giovanna hopes to increase her capital, and with this goal she comes to you petitionning for a loan. Your generous heart will enable the fulfillment of the dream of this brave young woman.

Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer.

Giovanna, a sus 21 años demostró ser una mujer muy empeñosa, creativa e inteligente, sus inmensas ganas de convertirse en una excelente profesional la motiva a seguir esforzándose en su noble labor de reciclaje de papel.Decidió dedicarse a esta actividad gracias a la iniciativa de sus queridos padres, quienes en todo momento la apoyaron y motivaron en el desempeño de su labor, durante sus horas libres recorre prácticamente todas las arterias de su ciudad natal,Juliaca, con el fin de adquirir su mercadería de los moradores, empresas, y distintas instituciones de su ciudad, luego de reunir una buena cantidad los vende a una fábricade cuadernos y papel higiénico, en la ciudad de arequipa.Con este ingenioso trabajo está logrando cubrir los gastos que demanda su educación en una Universidad Privada de su ciudad natal.Giovanna tiene pensado aumentar el monto de su capital, con ese propósito recurre a tu persona para hacerte la petición de un préstamo.Tu buen corazón permitirá cumplir los anhelos de esta valiosa joven.

loans.use: To increase her capital to be able to purchase a greater quantity of paper.

loans.name: Leopoldo

texts.es:
The production of carrying bags has become the primary business and source of income for Leopoldo and his beloved family, including his two small children and his hard working wife. He started this business about a year and a half ago with the guidance and motivation provided him by his younger sister Elizabeth, who also runs a similar business. Every member of the family works tirelessly to make the business a success, and thanks to this effort they have been able to infiltrate the markets in the cities of Puno, Arequipa, Cuzco, and their native city of Juliaca. Now they are seeing such a great demand that they decided to expand their business and to take on 2 workers so that they will help with the unemployment problem in their country, and to increase their merchandise. With this in mind they come to you to request your support.

Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer.

La confección de bolsas se ha convertido en la actividad que otorga el ingreso principal a Leopoldo y su querida familia que la integran sus 2 menores hijos y su emprendedora esposa. Inició este negocio hace aproximadamente un año y medio, gracias a los consejos y motivación de su hermana menor Elizabeth quien también está inmersa en este trabajo.Todos los miembros de su familia trabajan incansablemente para sacar adelante su taller, gracias a ello ha podido incursionar en los mercados de las ciudades de Puno, Arequipa, Cuzco y su ciudad natal Juliaca. Ahora al ver que tiene gran demanda decidió ampliar su taller y al mismo tiempo contratar 2 trabajadores para de esa manera disminuir la taza de desempleados de su país y aumentar la cantidad de su mercadería. Con ese propósito recurre a tI para solicitar tu desinteresado apoyo.

loans.use: Increase in capital to increase the production of carrying bags.

loans.name: María

texts.es:
Maria works every day buying and selling used car and motorbike parts. Early every morning, and with the help of her beloved husband, Maria leaves their modest home to visit the various cities in the Puno department of Peru in order to buy the spare parts. This allows her to make good income for the family, contributing to their well-being and peace of mind, and most importantly, providing for their two small children's education. Until recently, Maria was in very poor health, but thanks to the care, love and affection from her husband and children, she recuperated quickly. This brave and enterprising mother would like to increase her income in order to refurbish their home and provide a safer and more comfortable life for her loving family. Please consider helping this hardworking mother, who has always been very brave and optimistic.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Chegezy, Kiva volunteer.

La compra y venta de repuestos de automóviles y motos de segundo uso, es la actividad diaria de doña María; desde muy temprano y con ayuda de su querido esposo Víctor se dispone a abandonar su humilde morada para trasladarse a las distintas ciudades del departamento de Puno y así poder comprar sus repuestos y obtener buenos ingresos económicos para el bienestar y la tranquilidad de su familia y sobretodo para la educación de sus dos pequeños niños.Doña Maria hasta hace poco se encontraba muy delicada de salud, pero con el cuidado, cariño y amor de su esposo e hijos se recuperó rápidamente; el deseo que tiene esta valiente y emprendedora madre es generar mayores ingresos para refaccionar su domicilio y así vivir más segura y cómoda con su amorosa familia. Apoya a esta hacendosa madre con mucha valentía y optimismo.

loans.use: Additional funds used to purchase more spare car parts for resale.

loans.name: Emiliana

texts.es:
More than 20 years ago, Emiliana, 36, decided to move to the city of Juliaca with her beloved husband and children. Her children are now teenagers, who study hard and are very responsible, working in the family's ice cream business. The family started this business about 6 years ago. At first, they weren't very successful, as there were many other ice cream businesses in the area and this had a negative impact on their sales. However, as time went by, they worked hard, establishing the business and making sure to always offer high-quality, delicious products to their customers. This has allowed them to build a steady clientele. Emiliana is very happy with the results of their business thus far and would now like to increase production, especially at this time of year when there is the most demand for their delicious ice cream. Your generous support would allow her to realize her plans for the family business.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Chegezy, Kiva volunteer.

Hace más de 20 años la señora, Emiliana, de 36 años de edad decidió radicar en la ciudad de Juliaca junto a su querido esposo y sus adorados hijos que ahora son adolescentes muy estudiosos y responsables en su negocio heladero familiar. Emprendieron este negocio hace aproximadamente 6 años, en un inicio no parecía ser muy rentable porque existían muchos pobladores dedicados a esta actividad que mermaban sus ganacias. Conforme transcurría el tiempo fueron implementando su heladería y en todo momento se esforzaban para ofrecerles un buen y delicioso producto a sus clientes, así poco a poco iban obteniendo fieles consumidores.Actualmente doña Emiliana se siente muy feliz por los resultados que ha consiguiendo, es por ello que tiene pensado aumentar la cantidad de su producción, más aún por esta temporada donde sus deliciosos helados tiene mayor demanda.“Tu generoso aporte permitirá concretar los planes de esta empresarial familia”

loans.use: Additional capital in order to increase production.

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Microfinanzas PRISMA - Oct 26, 2008)

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana es costurera, confecciona maldices para cholitas tiene una máquina a pedal, misma que no le abastece para confeccionar la cantidad de demanda que tiene en su mercado, vive en la casa de su hermana y tiene un hijo de 5 años de edad. Su domicilio esta ubicado en la Zona los Ballivina  de la Ciudad de El Alto.
 
El crédito requiere para comprar una maquina semi industrial de costura, misma que le ayudará a incrementar su producción.
 
Este es su primer crédito con Impro. La evaluación realizada permite otorgarle  el  préstamo. Asimismo, su experiencia  y  su afán de superación motivan bastante.

loans.use: CAPITAL DE TRABAJO

loans.name: Maura

texts.es:
Ice cream production has always been a family tradition in the family of Mauricia, a young,hard-worker 28 year old. She learnt and inherited this business from her loving and humble parents, whom years ago initially established the ice cream shop that now Mauricia administers with plenty of diligence. Her wish is to increase production, and that is why she is coming to you to request a loan. With your good heart you will help realize the dreams of this young enterpreneur.

Translated from Spanish by Samantha, Kiva volunteer.

La producción de helados siempre fue el negocio familiar de Mauricia, joven empeñosa y hacendosa de 28 años de edad.Ésta emprendedora joven aprendió y heredó esta labor de sus queridos y humildes padres, quienes durante muchos años lograron implementar y sacar adelante su heladería y de la que con mucho empeño y diligencia administra Mauricio para continuar con la labor de sus padres. El deseo de esta emprendedora mujer es aumentar la cantidad de su producción, con ese anhelo recurre a ti para solicitarte un préstamo. “Con tu buen corazón permitirás concretar los anhelos de esta joven emprendedora”

loans.use: To increase production in her ice cream business.

loans.name: Federico

texts.es:
Federico is an inter-city public service driver (trufi) in La Paz El Alto. This job is his only source of income which he uses to support his two children and wife. He lives in the Zona Villa Tejada Tringular in La Paz city. The loan he is requesting will be used to to purchase a car, enabling him to work and support his family. This is his first loan with Impro, and the evaluation which has been carried approves his application

Translated from Spanish by Lucy Williams, Kiva volunteer

Federico es transportista de servicio público (trufi) inter ciudad La Paz El Alto, dicha actividad es su única fuente de ingreso con la que cubre la manutención de sus dos hijos y esposas. Su domicilio es en la Zona Villa Tejada Triangular de la Ciudad de La Paz. El crédito solicitado será destinado para el movimiento de su movilidad (compra de motor), el préstamo le permitirá seguir trabajando y sostener a su familia. Este es su primer crédito con Impro, la evaluación realizada permite aprobar el préstamo solicitado por Federico.

loans.use: TO PURCHASE A CAR

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth is a great, hardworking woman. Her love and devotion for her husband and six-year-old son, Jesus, drive her to continue working hard, dedicating her time to making bags, which she has been doing for over two years now. During that time she has been able to expand her small workshop and progressively increase her business. This young mother's greatest desire is to build her own home so that she has safe place to raise her young son and the other children that she and her husband hope to have in the future. However, in order to do this, Elizabeth needs additional funds for her job.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Chegezy, Kiva volunteer.

Elizabeth es una gran mujer y muy trabajadora, su gran amor y entrega por su esposo y su pequeño niño Jesús de 6 añitos de edad la motivan a seguir esforzándose en su noble oficio de confección de bolsas.Viene dedicándose a esta labor hace más de 2 años, en ese periodo logró ampliar su tallercito y crecer progresivamente con su negocio.El deseo más grande que tiene esta joven madre es construir su propia morada, con el fin de tener un lugar seguro donde cobijar a su pequeño niño y a los hijos que más adelante pretenden traer al mundo. Y para concretar este fin necesita elevar su capital de trabajo.

loans.use: Additional funds in order to increase production.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Despite her economic situation, Antonia has always had a strong desire to overcome life's challenges. Antonia, a loving mother, grew up in a modest home in the Vila Vila district, about 95 kilometers from where she now lives in the city of Juliaca. Ever since she started a family of her own she has fought hard to provide security and well-being for her three children, who are a source of great pride and happiness. She has worked constantly, buying and selling livestock (sheep and pigs). While this hardworking mother dedicates her time to this activity, her husband also works hard, tirelessly providing transportation services with his only means of transportation, a tricycle taxi. With much perseverance, both Antonia and her husband are finally achieving their goal of improving their family's quality of life. In light of the high demand for her products, Antonia would like to increase her investment capital. She kindly asks that you consider helping her.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Chegezy, Kiva volunteer.

Antonia, pese a su condición económica siempre demostró un gran deseo de superación. Esta dulce madre proviene de un humilde hogar del distrito de Vila Vila a unos 95 kilómetros de la ciudad en la que radica, Juliaca.Desde que formó su familia siempre ha luchado por el bienestar y seguridad de sus 3 queridos hijos, quienes se convirtieron en su mayor orgullo y alegría, trabajando constantemente en su actividad de compra y venta de ganados ( ovejas, chanchos).Mientras esta empeñosa madre se dedica a su noble labor, su hacendoso esposo trabaja incansablemente brindando servicios de movilidad, en su única herramienta de transporte su triciclo. Ambos con mucha perseverancia finalmente están logrando el propósitos de incrementar su nivel de vida y la de sus pequeños retoños.Doña Antonia viendo la demanda del mercado desea aumentar su capital de inversión, es por ello que recurre gentilmente a tu persona.

loans.use: Increase in investment capital.

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Microfinanzas PRISMA - Oct 22, 2008)

loans.name: María

texts.es:
Maria has never lacked employment opportunities because she has always enjoyed and been very committed to each of the jobs she has undertaken. For the last five years she has been working selling sandwiches and soft drinks on a busy street in the city of Juliaca and her work has allowed her to provide education, well-being and security for her two small boys. Her children are the loves of her life and are what motivates her to work hard so that she can raise them to be fine young men with a promising future. Maria would like to expand her business, offer a greater variety of products, and increase her stock, especially now during the school year when she gets the most business. Therefore, this cheerful and dedicated mother would like to ask for your help in securing a loan. Maria and her children would greatly appreciate your help!

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Chegezy, Kiva volunteer.

Las oportunidades de trabajo nunca fueron escasas para María, debido a que siempre demostró gran afición y dedicación por cada una de las actividades que desempeña, es así que desde hace 5 años viene dedicándose a la comercialización de bocadillos y bebidas gaseosas en forma ambulatoria en una concurrida calle de la ciudad de Juliaca, con esta noble labor está logrando brindar educación, bienestar, y seguridad a sus 2 pequeños niños, quienes son su mayor adoración y el motor que la impulsa a seguir adelante, para que en el futuro sean hombre de bien, con un prometedor porvenir.El deseo que tiene es ampliar su puesto de venta y aumentar la variedad y stock de mercadería, más aun por esta temporada escolar, donde sus productos tienen mayor demanda.Es con ese fin que esta alegre y amorosa madre recurre a ti persona para solicitarte un préstamo. “María y sus hijos apreciarán mucho tu ayuda”

loans.use: Increase capital in order to buy more products.

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Microfinanzas PRISMA - Oct 22, 2008)

loans.name: Beni

texts.es:
Sandra has always been drawn to cosmetology, a field in which she is very skilled. When she was a little girl she dreamt of having her own beauty salon and therefore didn't have to think twice when deciding what career to pursue. After saving for quite some time, she rented a space in a popular shopping center in the city of Juliaca. Through much hard work, she has been able to set up her own salon and her abilities and excellent customer service have now started bringing her regular customers. This outgoing and resourceful woman now wishes to expand her beauty salon into a larger business and she is working hard towards this goal. Her work brings her much satisfaction and the promise of a positive future. In order to make her plans a reality she will need to invest a large amount of money in her business, and therefore asks for your support. She is requesting a loan, which will allow her dreams to take shape.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Chegezy, Kiva volunteer.

Sandra siempre demostró una gran vocación y agilidad por el noble trabajo que desempeñan las cosmetólogas de su país desde niña soñó con tener su propio salón de belleza, es por ello que sin pensarlo dos veces decidió dedicarse completamente a esta actividad.Con el ahorro que durante mucho tiempo reunió, decidió alquilar un local en un concurrido centro comercial de la ciudad de Juliaca, y así poco a poco con mucho esfuerzo está logrando implementar su salón.Actualmente, gracias a la agilidad y habilidad de sus manos y sobre todo al buen servicio que ofrece está logrando acoger asiduos clientes, el deseo que anhela conseguir esta alegre y emprendedora dama es convertir su salón de belleza en un gran centro de estética, con ese fin se esfuerza y persevera en esta labor, que le va generando mucha satisfacción y expectativa. Para concretar sus planes requiere invertir una buena cantidad de dinero, con ese fin recurre a tu solidario corazón, para pedirte un préstamo. Este dinero le permitirá iniciar la cristalización de sus sueños.

loans.use: Increase of capital in order to make improvements to her beauty salon

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Microfinanzas PRISMA - Oct 24, 2008)

loans.name: Jesil

texts.es:
Señora Carol is popular and loved in her neighborhood. Her tireless, fighting spirit allowed her to open a business from her house. No one imagined it would later become the busiest store in her area, all thanks to her strength, dedication and good customer service.

Carol succeded in providing all the necessities for her family, most importantly the education of her little children. Now with more peace in her life she has great aspirations and hopes for the future. One of these is to expand the variety and quantity of her store’s stock. For this goal, she turns to you for a loan.

Translated from Spanish by Nathan, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Carol es muy popular y querida en su barrio, su incansable espíritu luchador la hizo emprender un negocio al interior de su vivienda, jamás se imaginó que con el transcurso del tiempo se convertiría en una de las más concurridas bodeguitas de su zona, gracias a su esfuerzo, dedicación y sobre todo buen trato a sus clientes, logró suplir satisfactoriamente las necesidades de su hogar, sobre todo la educación de sus pequeños niños.Actualmente con la tranquilidad ya dada tiene grandes aspiraciones en mente e ilusiones en la vida , una de ellas es la de ampliar y aumentar la variedad y stock de su mercadería, con ese propósito recurre a ti persona para solicitarte un préstamo.

loans.use: Invest in a greater quantity of goods for her store

loans.name: Venancia

texts.es:
Despite the difficult moments that Doña Venencia has experienced, she has kept the strength to move forward with her three beloved children, for who she always ensured good health and education. She is a courageous woman who has acted the part of mother and father since separating from her husband, working tirelessly to never be wont of necessities.

With much effort she started her small grocery store and bought a tricycle to sell a large variety of snacks and soft drinks on the busy boulevard in the city of Juliaca. While this hard-working and cheerful mother is out selling the snacks her three dear children watch over the store. They all chip in their best to be successful and raise their quality of life.

This enterprising family wants to increase the store's stock and they turn to you: “Your indispensable contribution will allow Doña Venancia and her charming family to achieve their plans.”

Translated from Spanish by Nathan, Kiva Volunteer.

Pese a los momentos difíciles por los que ha tenido que atravesar doña Venancia, mantuvo la fortaleza para salir adelante junto a sus 3 queridos hijos por quienes en todo momento veló para brindarles una buena educación y seguridad.Ella es una madre muy valerosa, desde que se separó de su esposo se convirtió en padre y madre de sus hijos, trabajando incansablemente con el fin de que no pasen limitaciones económicas.Es por ello que con mucho esfuerzo pudo implementar su pequeña bodeguita y al mismo tiempo decidió comprar un triciclo para vender una inmensa variedad de golosinas y bebidas gaseosas en forma ambulatoria en una concurrida avenida de la ciudad de Juliaca.Mientras ésta esforzada y alegre madre vende afanosamente sus golosinas sus queridos hijos se encargan de atender su bodeguita, y todos juntos ponen lo mejor de sí para tratar de salir adelante y elevar su calidad de vida.El deseo de esta emprendedora familia es aumentar el stock de su mercadería, con ese propósito recurre a tu persona “ Vuestro indispensable aporte logrará concretar los planes de doña Venancia y su encantadora familia”

loans.use: Increase her store's merchandise

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca does the work typical in forest areas, cultivating citrus fruits and coffee on her two acres of land. She just began with the coffee and hopes to see good results from her harvest in half a year.

Francisca lives with her beloved husband and works to cover her basic necessities, but also has set herself goals for the future. One project is to increase her coffee harvest and sell it to foreign markets. She needs more capital to buy more coffee plants and go through with her plan; a loan will give her the necessary support to start.

Translated from Spanish by Nathan, Kiva Volunteer.

Francisca, desarrolla la actividad típica de la zona de la selva, el cultivo de cítricos y café, posee dos hectáreas de cultivo de cítricos y ha iniciado el procesamiento de café y espera que a mitad de año obtener resultados positivos en sus cosechas.Ahora que vive sólo en compañía de su querido esposo trabaja para su sostén diario, sin embargo no han dejado de trazarse metas a futuro como el de acrecentar su siembra de café para comercializarlo en el extranjero. Pero este proyecto tiene un costo fuera del alcance de francisca y por ello solicita un préstamo para la compra de plantas de café. Con su apoyo francisca podrá adquirir lo necesario para iniciar su proyecto.

loans.use: To buy coffee plants, compost and fertilizer.

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Microfinanzas PRISMA - Oct 22, 2008)

loans.name: Esther

texts.es:
Esther is known as an enterprising and optimistic woman. Her clients recognize the hard work she puts into her work everyday and see her worried about the care of her farmland and an adecuate spreading of compost. All this to support her family economically and most importantly pay her children’s education, which is a cost that continues to demand more and more.

Despite Esther’s hard work in her fields, her crops are not improving and she is very worried because the only way to better her next harvest will be to use compost and buy a greater amount of plants. She hopes you can kindly contribute so she can reach her goal.

Translated from Spanish by Nathan, Kiva Volunteer.

ESTHER, se caracteriza por ser una dama emprendedora y optimista, sus clientes conocen del trabajo que realiza y el empeño que le pone a su actividad todos los días, al verla muy preocupada en el cuidado de sus terrenos y el adecuado abono que le da a sus productos. Todo ello con el fin de poder solventar los gastos de su familia y sobre todo cubrir la inversión que demanda la educación de sus 2 hijos quienes a medida que van creciendo van demandando mayor inversión, Esther trata de cubrir de cierta forma los requerimientos y necesidades de sus hijos, con tal de verlos realizados.A pesar del gran esfuerzo que tiene que hacer en sus chacras sus productos no están mejorando y ella está muy preocupada, porque la única manera sería abonar sus terrenos y comprar mayor cantidad de plantas de cultivo para mejorar su próxima cosecha. Para ello requiere de una suma de dinero el cual solicita en calidad de préstamo y espera que usted pueda cooperar noblemente para alcanzar este propósito.

loans.use: To buy fruit plants, composts and fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Gina

texts.es:
Gina’s two young boys are the motor that inspires her to continue the difficult job of a mother. This attractive young entrepreneur and wife uses her free time to sell cosmetic products that highlight a woman’s beauty. She sells to her friends and in locations with high foot traffic with the goal of increasing her clientele. Bringing her products to prospective clients is essential in this type of business—she can close sales on the spot or leave people with the catalogues to browse and order later.

Gina wants to buy more beauty products from the catalogues to sell immediately. She needs capital to do this.

Translated from Spanish by Nathan, Kiva Volunteer.

GINA, es una joven madre de dos pequeños niños que se han convertido en el motor que la impulsa a continuar el arduo camino de madre, esposa y una bella mujer quien consagra su tiempo libre a la venta de productos de belleza que resalte la hermosura de una dama. Estos productos los oferta a sus amistades y de vez en cuando en diversos sitios de masiva concurrencia con el propósito de establecer lazos de amistad y lograr incrementar el número de clientes y sus respectivas ventas, el llevar productos a sus posibles compradores es muy esencial en esta labor nos refiere, porque algunas personas desean adquirirlos al instante y otras a través de los respectivos catálogos donde pueden elegir un sin número de productos y esperar.A través de la demanda de las personas, Gina, desea adquirir mayor cantidad de productos de belleza los cuales puede tenerlos bajo su custodia y venderlos de manera inmediata. Sin embargo requiere de un capital de inversión para acceder a los productos que ofertan en los catálogos.

loans.use: Invest in beauty products to sell

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Microfinanzas PRISMA - Oct 24, 2008)

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel transports plants to the capital, selling them by the dozen. They are special plants that she grows on her patio and garden, and used in funeral wreaths and for placing at a gravestones.

Isabel realized that in the capital city she could make more money which she needs to support her children, especially her older two who are attending college in the capital. She also takes advantage of her frequent trips to the capital to shop wholesale.

To increase the amount of flowers she sells Isabel needs a loan, and asks us to contribute.

Translated from Spanish by Nathan, Kiva Volunteer.

ISABEL, tiene una ardua labor de trasportar plantas a la capital, son especiales y las siembra en el patio de su casa o dentro de su chacra porque son utilizadas en las decoraciones de las coronas que llevan a los velorios o a los cementerios para sus seres queridos y por ser de gran utilidad a Isabel se le ocurrió llevarlos hasta la capital para venderlos por docenas y obtener mayores ingresos, los cuales son necesarios para solventar los gastos de sus hijos y en especial la de sus dos hijos mayores quienes cursan estudios superiores en la capital.Ahora esta aprovechando sus viajes para comprar algunos productos de la empresa UNION quienes ofrecen deliciosos productos masivos para la comunidad. Para aumentar la oferta de productos en su nuevo desempeño necesita un préstamo para dar un gran realce a su negocio y pide podamos contribuir con ello.

loans.use: Buy more plants and increase her flower cultivation

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita is an exceptional wife and mother as, although she cannot count on any income from her husband due to his bad health (he has a bad back and cannot move normally), she does the best she can to get through their problems and help him to recuperate. She would like a loan to be able to improve her small shop, and thereby increase their income and her beloved family's quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Liz Harvey, Kiva Volunteer

MARGARITA, es una esposa y madre excepcional porque a pesar de no contar con los ingresos de su esposo quien se encuentra delicado de salud por un mal que tiene en la columna y que no lo deja desplazarse con normalidad; hace todo el esfuerzo posible para desempeñarse sin problemas con la esperanza de ayudarlo a recuperarse pronto. Con el deseo de mejorar su desempeño en su pequeña bodeguita, solicita un préstamo para incrementar sus ingresos y el nivel de vida de su amada familia.

loans.use: To increase capital to offer more products in his small shop/Incremento de capital para ofertar mayor cantidad de productos en su pequeña bodega.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es:
Cecilia is a single parent, but this is not an obstacle for her, and she is an exceptional and virtuous mother. For a long time she has had a small shop, and with her hard work she has been able to contribute to the development of her 5 lovely kids. Now she is alone at home and would like to convert her shop into one of the best in the city, and she would like to refurbish her home to make it more comfortable. For this reason she is asking for a loan with the desire for you to be an important part of her project.

Translated from Spanish by Liz Harvey, Kiva Volunteer

CECILIA, es madre soltera pero esto no fue obstáculo para convertirse en una madre excepcional y llena de virtudes. Se desempeña desde hace mucho tiempo en su pequeña bodeguita y con su esforzada labor ha podido contribuir con el desarrollo de sus cinco queridos hijos. Ahora se encuentra sola en casa y desea convertir su bodeguita en una de las mejores de su ciudad y acondicionar su humilde casita para vivir más cómoda. A esa razón atiende su petición de un préstamo con el deseo de que usted sea parate importante de su proyecto.

loans.use: To increase capital to offer more products/Incremento de capital para ofertar mayor cantidad de productos.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
Graciela works in her fruit stall where people from nearby bring their products. She selects their products and puts them in boxes so that they can be transported to the big cities of Peru. This hard work is reflected in the wages she earns and she enjoys it when her and her 2 daughters put effort into the work. Now Graciela has many projects in mind and she wants to increase the amount of buyers she has so that they ask for her services;she would then be able to send out her products in various lorries. The loan would pay for this great desire.

Translated from Spanish by Liz Harvey, Kiva Volunteer

GRACIELA, trabaja netamente en su bodega de frutas donde las personas de la chacras cercanas llevan sus productos, su labor es de seleccionar estos productos y encajonarlos debidamente para su pronta transportación a las grandes ciudades del Perú.Este arduo trabajo está reflejado en las ganas y en el esfuerzo de Marlene en su actividad y en compañía de sus dos hijas su trabajo es más ameno. Ahora Graciela tiene diversos proyectos en mente y desea ampliar su cobertura para tener muchos más compradores a fin de que soliciten sus servicios y aumentar sus cargas de producción en los diversos camiones. La solicitud de un préstamo atiende este gran deseo.

loans.use: To increase capital to get more fruit/Incremento de capital para acopiar mayor cantidad de frutas.

loans.name: Rita

texts.es:
Since she was young Rita has done many different jobs, and now she is married and has 4 kids, she has even more reason to work hard for her beloved family. She has joined with her sister to make bricks, and she has seen the possibility to go it alone as in a short time she has made many acquaintances in the city. Rita would like a loan to put together a workshop in her small home and to start to work independently.

Translated from Spanish by Liz Harvey, Volunteer Translator

RITA, es una mujer que desde joven estuvo desempeñándose en diversos trabajos, ahora que se ha convertido en esposa y madre de 4 hijos tiene mayores razones para desempeñarse en bien de su amada familia. Se ha asociado con su hermana para elaborar ladrillos y ha observado la posibilidad de independizarse ya que en poco tiempo se han hecho muy conocidas en su ciudad. Rita solicita un préstamo para ambientar un taller en su pequeña casita e iniciar su labor de manera independiente.

loans.use: To get a workshop to make bricks/Implementación de un taller para elaborar ladrillos

loans.name: Livia

texts.es:
Livia, despite having no support from her partner who left her a few years ago when their second son was born, has never felt limited, in fact her situation has helped her to mature and to let herself go by working. Now she has a shop whose business is helping her to cover the household costs and to look after her two kids. Although they are young they have needs and she hopes to fulfill these through her work. She hopes to see her business grow and to improve her products, and she would like a loan as it would help her to make her business sustainable.

Translated from Spanish by Liz Harvey, Kiva Volunteer

LIVIA, a pesar de no contar con el apoyo de su pareja, quien la abandonó a pocos años del nacimiento de su segundo hijo, no se sintió limitada en ningún aspecto por el contrario este hecho la ayudo a madurar y a desenvolverse de manera eficiente dentro de un entorno laboral. Más ahora posee una tienda cuyo negocio le está ayudando a solventar los gastos de sus dos hijos quienes son aún pequeños y requieren de cuidados y ciertas necesidades que espera satisfacer a través de su trabajo. Ella espera incrementar su negocio y mejorar sus productos y solicita un préstamo que sería de gran ayuda para hacer de su bodega un negocio sostenible.

loans.use: To increase capital to offer better quality products/Incremento de capital para ofertar mayor cantidad de productos.

loans.name: Micaela Bastidas Group

texts.en:
“Micaela Bastidas” is a small rural community bank of FINCA Peru’s Wari-project which provides its credit with education services in the rural areas of Huancavelica. Huancavelica is considered one of the poorest regions of Peru and has many limitations being a very mountainous area (altitude ranges from 6,000 – 17,000 ft above sea level), the cold, the difficulty to grow crops and the lack of an adequate infrastructure of roads and communication systems.

BCR “Micaela Bastidas” is located the community of Choclococha in the district of the same name, province of Acobamba. The main activities of the population are the growth of corn and potatoes and most of the population also is dedicated to raising bulls, cows, sheep and smaller cattle.

The bank has been formed recently with 11 female borrowers and therefore has no history yet. It has only just started to create history in its community! The expectations working with FINCA Peru are very clear: increase business and save. For all members, the main use of the savings they will be generating as of now is for investing in their businesses or for the education of their children, whether to buy school uniforms, supplies, books or paying the fee for entering primary or secondary school.

Most women have small businesses that require small loans; therefore, almost all members have a 200 soles loan, with the exception of two women, who each have loans of 500 soles. The total of the loans is 2,900 soles among the 11 members.

One of the group´s members, Tomasa L. Auccapiña, sells bread at the local markets. Another small business she runs is a small flour mill for wheat and other cereals. With her 200 soles loan she will be able to buy more supplies for her small store. When asked about her future, she says that her dream is the education of her children so they can be professionals and keep studying. And another dream is for her store to grow so that she will be able to move to a bigger city to run a bigger store there. With her (future) savings, she will buy more merchandise for her store. Already she has learned to be more nice in her store, to treat clients well, and to be more hygienic. She also learned about the importance of saving.

Marina M. C. has another story. She has a small oven to make bread. She sells the bread at local markets and sometimes in town, in her small grocery-store where she also sells fruits. With her loan of 200 soles she will be able to buy more supplies for her business. Her dream for the future is simply to live a good life with her family and her children. She will use her savings to buy more merchandise, sell more, and then save more. Her expectations working with FINCA Peru are to learn to work harder and be more responsible.

loans.use: Buy new supplies

loans.name: Amador

texts.es:
Amador is a butcher and he has an established post in the market in the city of La Merced. Each morning he offers a great variety of meat after going to make sure that the meat gets its quality certificate and can be distributed. He has a rented space and paying this does not help him to achieve his dream of buying his own small house, as the rent is very high. He would like a post so that he will soon be able to achieve his much anticipated dream.

Translated from Spanish by Li z Harvey, Kiva Volunteer

AMADOR, es carnicero y su puesto está establecido en el mercado de ciudad de La Merced, en el que todas las mañanas oferta una gran variedad de carnes después de ir al camal en el que se encargan de certificar la calidad y su distribución. Él se desemP. en un espacio alquilado y el pago del mismo no lo ayuda a alcanzar el sueño de adquirir una pequeña casita ya que el costo del alquiler en este mercado es muy elevado, desea comprar un puesto de ventas para desempeñarse de mejor manera a fin de alcanzar en poco tiempo su ansiado sueño.

loans.use: To buy a space to sell/Compra de un espacio de ventas.

loans.name: Magda

texts.es:
MAGDA, is a hard-working and self-sacrificing mother that always is alert of her home and of her children. She sells chickens in a small locality. She wakes up in the early hours to prepare the business and make tempting lunches. Because of her embarrassment and that she suffers from some inconveniences leaves her to live the same lifestyle that she had lived before. She also has suffered from some diminishing sales.She would like to open up her own restaurant dedicated to the sale of typical dishes in order to take advantage of hte market at the Rich Village and Oxampapa. She requests a loan to increase the quantity of chickens in order to initiate the whole sale distribution of it in little time.

This story has been translated from Spanish to English by Nikita Ramchandani, KIVA Volunteer.

MAGDA, es una madre abnegada y trabajadora que siempre está pendiente de su hogar y de sus hijos. Por las mañanas vende en un pequeño local sus fresquísimos pollos que llegan a su hogar a muy tempranas horas para que ella pueda seleccionarlos y ofertarlos a las amas de casa para la preparación de sus apetitosos almuerzos.A consecuencia de su embarazo está sufriendo algunas molestias que sin duda no la deja continuar con el mismo ritmo de vida que llevaba antes pero hace el esfuerzo de desempeñarse lo mejor posible y disminuir sus ventas.Sin duda también hace mención que le gustaría poder abrir un restaurante donde dedicarse a la venta de platos típicos a fin de aprovechar la vía que divide Villa rica y Oxapampa. Solicita un préstamo para incrementar la cantidad de pollos que ferta a fin de iniciar en poco tiempo su repartición al por mayor.

loans.use: Incremento de capital para ofertar mayor número de pollos.

loans.name: Toribio

texts.es:
DON TORIBIO, a long time ago had a business of furniture design that came with a thousand wonders and no problems until a natural disaster struck. This was the cause of him loosing his workshop years ago. Since then he has worked as a taxi driver in order to save up money to rebuild his workshop. However, the money he has raised is not enough to build it. He is asking for a loan to rebuild his workshop and finally perform the work that he is passionate about.

This story has been translated from Spanish to English by Nikita Ramchandani, KIVA Volunteer.

DON TORIBIO, hace mucho tiempo atrás tuvo un negocio de cajonería en el que todo marchaba de mil maravillas pero sin duda nunca faltan los problemas y sobre todo cuando se trata de un desastre natural. Este hecho precisamente ocasionó la pérdida de su taller hace años y desde entonces ha tenido que desempeñarse como mototaxista debido a que la inversión para instalar una vez su espacio de trabajo es muy elevado y no cuenta con un espacio adecuado para tal fin.La solicitud de un préstamo es para realizar la instalación de su pequeño taller una vez más a fin de dedicarse a la labor que tanto le apasiona.

loans.use: To gain capital to install a workshop.

loans.name: Satupaitea Satufia 2 Centre - Group 1

texts.en:
After four weeks of rigorous business training, these four women of Satupaitea Satufia on the island of Savaii, passed theirwritten tests on the SPBD principles (business, savings, weekly meetings, payments and group guarantee) to ensure their first group loan from SPBD. Over the next year, they will support each other in their individual business development and to guarantee on-time payments.

Faleieiroma S., 23, is married to a farmer and has two children. She grows cabbages and tomatoes in her vegetable garden. She wishes to use her loan to purchase a weed killing sprayer and pesticides, vegetable seeds, fertilizer and 2 bush knives. She will sell her produce three days a week to the public and people from her village.

Aveina T., 32, married, has five children. She has over three years of experience baking donuts and pork cakes and growing taro. She will use her loan to purchase a weed killing sprayer, pesticides, a knife, a filing, cabbage seeds and fertilizer.

Fuatino U., 33, is divorced with three children. She maintains a taro plantation and sells her produce at a fair price twice a week. With her loan, she will purchase a weed killing sprayer, pesticides, 2 bush knives, a spade, a shovel, a knife filing. This will also pay for her transportation needs.

Loimata A., 28, is married with two children. With over two years of experience, she grows cabbage and cucumber and sells them twice a week. She will use her loan to purchase pesticides, a wheel barrow, 2 knives, a shovel, a spade, a filing and laborers.

loans.use: To purchase farming equipment

loans.name: Salelologa Foua Centre - Group 1

texts.en:
After four weeks of rigorous business training, these eight women of Salelologa Foua on the island of Savaii passed their written tests on the SPBD principles (business, savings, weekly meetings, payments and group guarantee) to ensure their first group loan from SPBD. Over the next year, they will support each other in their individual business development to guarantee on-time payments.

The loans will be used for the following purposes:

Iuliana L., 44, married, with five children will buy Elei clothing (traditional Samoan fabric printing): materials, paints, x-ray papers, elei board and brushes.

Juliana S., 29, married, with one child will buy fishing equipment: fishing net, spear, torch, goggles and fishing bait.

Miliama L., 43, married, with three children, will buy fishing and sewing materials: a pair of fishing boots, a spear, goggles, a torch and a sewing machine.

Sapi U., 37, married, with three children, will buy ingredient to bake and sell pancakes: flour, soda powder, fryer, oil, fork and an oven.

The following women are involved in plantations (taro, tuamu, bananas, etc) and request a loan to purchase the below items:

Pea T., 50, married, with 10 children will buy weed killing sprayer, pesticides and 2 shovels.

Lagi E., 68, married, with six children will buy weed killing sprayer, pesticides, a shovel, 2 bush knives, 2 knife filings, and 2 bags of fertilizer.

Pai Luamanu V., 43, married, with four children will buy weed killing sprayer, pesticides, 2 knives, 2 knife filings, 2 bags of fertilizer and additional chemicals.

Faleupolu P., 42, married, with five children will buy weed killing sprayer, pesticides, a shovel, 2 bush knives, a knife filing, and a wheel barrow.

loans.use: To purchase equipment and materials for various businesses

loans.name: Taga 3 Centre - Group 1

texts.en:
After four weeks of rigorous business training, these five women of Taga 3 on the island of Savaii, passed their written test on the SPBD principles (business, savings, weekly meetings, payments and group guarantee) to ensure their first group loan from SPBD. Over the next year, they will support each other in their individual business development to guarantee on-time payments.

Penquin Elisapeta M., 37 years old, is married, with no children. She has over two years of experience growing taro on her plantation and selling it at the flea market once a week. She comes from a long line of farmers. She will use her loan to purchase a weed killing sprayer, pesticides, a license, cabbages and tomatoes.

Kaisarina A., 49, is married, with eight children. She is involved in both farming and pancake making. Her main farming produce is taro, a staple of the Samoan diet. With her loan, she will purchase a license to sell, flour, sugar, oil and yeast for the pancakes and pesticide for the taro plantation.

Iokapeta F., 37, is married, with four children. Her brother bakes an assortment of goods including donuts, pies and pork cakes. Iokapeta sells them five days a week to school children and to people in her village. Her loan will be used to purchase flour, sugar, soda powder, oil and mutton flaps (lamb ribs).

Falanika S., 39, is divorced, with two children. She is starting a new business where she will sell cabbages and tomatoes for three days a week. Her loan will be used to purchase a weed killing sprayer, pesticides, a rake, and a spade and cabbage seeds.

Lole F., 51, is married, with seven children. She is starting a new business where she will sell pork cakes and pork buns for six days a week. Her loan will allow her to purchase flour, yeast, oil, sugar, mutton flaps and a pot.

loans.use: To purchase equipment and ingredients

loans.name: Mao

texts.en:
Mrs. Mao P., age 55, is a mother of five children. She stays at home and looks after the children, including cooking food for her family members. Two of her children are married and live away from home. Another earns a living by selling rice. The other children are students.

Her husband Mr. Kem Keng, 54, works as a wedding chef. He also installs the musical system whenever one of the nearby villages has a party or celebration. On average, he earns around $12 in revenue per day.

He needs a loan from Kiva to expand his business. He would like to purchase more tables and chairs and other equipment for his wedding business. This will help him if his customers need to celebrate a big party or a huge weeding. This will allow the family to earn more income. (Mrs. Mao P. is pictured and this is the second loan for her family.)

loans.use: To purchase more tables and chairs and other equipment

loans.name: Nhem

texts.en: Mrs. Nhem L., 19, sells beef at the Seri Sorpoant Market, Banteay Meanchey Province. Her husband Tek Bak also sells beef, and together they earn about $30 per day. L. hasn’t had children yet. With her stable business and desire to expand for the future, L. requests a $1,000 loan to purchase more cows and oxen to kill to sell beef. This investment will help expand her business and hopefully increase her income.

loans.use: To purchase more cows and oxen

loans.name: Fozia's Group

texts.en:
My name is Fozia T. from Lahore, the second largest city in Pakistan. I am married and a mother of five: two girls and three boys. One of my boys works at a local bank as a peon, and another works at a leather factory for a meager income, while both of my daughters are married. I sell cloth but my husband does not work at present due to a major surgery he had two months ago.

My group members who will share in the loan are: Usha and Nazia, both of whom run separate beauty parlors; Samina, who is borrowing for her family’s paint business, and Mumtaz B., who will invest her share of the loan in her grocery store.

loans.use: To purchase cloth in bulk for the business.

loans.name: Shamim's Group

texts.en:
I am Shamim K., a mother of five: four girls and one boy. One of my daughters is married; the remaining three sew clothes, while my son works at a local company. I am a cook at someone’s house, and my husband is a rickshaw driver. Last year, I got a loan from Asasah and bought my daughters sewing machines, and this year we need a loan to repair our rickshaw.

I have been joined in my loan group by three other women: Chanda Z., who also wants this loan to fix her rickshaw; Asiah J., who sews clothes for her neighborhood clients, and Parween L., who sells cloth. This loan will be distributed among the group members either for their own business or their household’s commerce.

loans.use: To repair our rickshaw

loans.name: Rani's Group

texts.en:
I am Rani F. from the city of Lahore, Pakistan. I am married and the mother of four: three boys and one girl, all of whom are married and live separately, with the exception of one son, who lives with me and is the major breadwinner of the family. To make a living he operates a rickshaw which needs to be replaced with a new one, hence our need of a loan.

The members of the group who will share in the loan are: Sardaran B., who will invest her portion in her furniture business; Tahira A., who wants to fix her rickshaw, and Asiah Y., who is borrowing for the expansion of her grocery store.

loans.use: To purchase a new rickshaw.

loans.name: Martha's Group

texts.en:
My name is Martha R.. I have been married for 30 years and have four children: two girls and two boys. I reside with my family in Lahore, the second largest city in Pakistan. My husband works at Pakistan Railways and in the evening drives a rickshaw to supplement his income. Now, one of my sons also plans to buy a separate rickshaw, which he will drive after his office hours; hence we require a loan.

The members of my group will also share in this loan: Tania S., who needs a loan for her family’s paint business; Nazia F., who is borrowing to fix her husband’s taxi; Usha V., who sews clothes, and Farzana B., who will use her share to get their rickshaw repaired.

loans.use: To purchase a new rickshaw

loans.name: Nazia's Group

texts.en:
I am the group leader, Nazia T.. I have been married for eight years and have three children: one boy and two girls. My elder daughter attends grade two and the younger attends grade one, while my son is not yet of school age. My husband works at a local company as a peon, and after his office hours he operates a rickshaw. He works very hard so that he can put food on our table and send our children to school. Currently our rickshaw is in need of maintenance and therefore we need a loan.

There are four other women in my loan group who reside in my neighborhood: Mariam J., who will invest her share of the loan in her family’s auto spare parts business; Rani B., who wants to expand her boutique; Mahwish B., who is borrowing for her mobile phones store, and lastly, Shazia A., who also wants this loan to fix her rickshaw

loans.use: To repair our rickshaw.

loans.name: Sor

texts.en:
Mrs. Sor S. O., age 28, is a mother of four children. Together with her husband Mr. Tay Sokalenine, 31, they run a goldsmith shop. Normally they earn around $5 a day in profit. Their children are students.

To improve the goldsmith business, this couple needs to purchase more goldsmith tools to assist in their work.

loans.use: To purchase more goldsmith tools

loans.name: Buburoziya

texts.ru:
Buburoziya M. lives in the town of Yavan. She is 44 years old, married and has five children. She has secondary education. She makes a steady income by breeding large and small types of cattle. She has a small farm where she keeps goats and calves. But Buburoziya wants to buy a cow so that she can get fresh milk. During the spring and summer months it's very simple to feed the cattle because fodder is widely available, but she does not have the money. Buburoziya decided to get a loan which will help her realize her plans. She can also sell the milk from the cow which will bring additional income to her family. Having five children it is crucial for her to increase her income. She plans to pay off the loan within 6 months.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Меникулова Бубурозия проживает в городе Яван. Ей 44 лет , она замужем и имеет пятерых детей. Образование среднее. Стабильный заработок имеет путем разведения крупно и мелко рогатого скота. Имеет клиентка небольшое хозяйство в котором имеет козочек и телят. Но Меникулова Бубурозия хочет купить одну дойную корову , для того чтобы получать свежее молоко. Весной и летом содержать крупно-рогатый скот просто , так как нет проблем с кормами. Но для этого у клиентки нет денег. Поэтому она запланировала получить кредит , который поможет ей реализовать свои планы. Кроме того получаемое ею молоко она сможет продавать и получать дополнительный доход для своей семьи , так как у нее 5 детей и клиентке просто необходимо увеличивать свои доходы. А погасить кредит клиентка планирует в течении 6 месяцев.

loans.use: To buy a cow

loans.name: Gaibullaeva

texts.ru:
M. Gaibullaeva is 45 years old, married and has four children. She works as seamstress making men's shirts in a joint partnership Chavoni. Her older son who is 20 years old left to Russian Federation to find work. M.'s plan for the future is to get his son married and build an extension to the house. She needs real finances to make this happen, but together with her husband they earn very small incomes which are only enough for daily living expenses. Because of this her husband also decided to go to Russia to earn money. He needs 1,500 somoni ($450US) for this trip and this is why M. has come to Microinvest.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer.
